grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 営繕【エイゼン】maintenance and repair, upkeep (of equipment)
kun reading compounds: 繕う【つくろう】to mend, to patch up, to repair, to fix, to darn, to fix (hair, clothes, appearance etc.), to adjust, to tidy up, to groom, to keep up appearances, to cover up (e.g. a mistake), to gloss over, to treat (illness, injury, etc.)
